::Hevn::
       He sighs and shakes his head.  "Dear Blackheart.  How naive you are.  
I was once considered a Maximal, though I suppose you don't know that, as 
were you."  He shrugs and shakes his head again.  "But that was the past.  
This is the present.  If you are happy here then here is where I shall stay."

--part1_11c.21d3f2f9.2be4a5f7_boundary
